description:
The tennis club goes cycling together. Nasuno rides up on a rather unusual bicycle, and Marimo shows up on that might be pretty difficult to ride. And Kanae... is that even a bicycle?!
Once the four of them begin riding, it`s questionable whether the path they`re taking is suitable for cycling at all...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nasu: Summer in Andalusia with Senpai
Senpai to Nasu: Andalusia no Natsu
先輩と茄子 アンダルシアの夏
